import React, { Component } from 'react' import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; class AddEditUser extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { name: '', email: '', phone: null, address: '' } } submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); event.target.className += " was-validated"; let { name, value} = event.target this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value}) console.log(this.state) }; changeHandler = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; render() { const { name, email, phone, address} = this.state; return (
